title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Intensive 5-hour course covering HTML, CSS, JS, Node.js. Build modern web apps.

title: Java Programming Fundamentals
description: Learn Java basics in 7 hours, covering data types, control structures, and OOP.

title: Machine Learning with Python
description: Explore ML in 6 hours, including supervised/unsupervised learning and projects.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Master algorithms in 3 hours. Covers arrays, linked lists, trees, and problem-solving.

title: Full-Stack JavaScript Developer
description: Become a Full-Stack Developer in 10 hours. Includes React, Node.js, MongoDB, and projects.

title: Ethical Hacking and Cybersecurity
description: Cybersecurity expert in 9 hours. Learn security, penetration testing, and defense strategies.

title: Database Management
description: Master databases in 8 hours, covering SQL, NoSQL, and data modeling.

title: Problem Solving
description: Enhance problem-solving in 4 hours. Strategies for programming and software development.

title: Software Engineering
description: Learn software engineering in 2 hours. Develop methodologies, design patterns, and best practices.
